EmailTemplate.description: Install Scheduling Date Has Been Set or Changed - Customer and Sales Rep
EmailTemplate.name: Install Scheduling Date Has Been Set or Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} - {!Account.BillingAddress} Installation Scheduled Date Has Been Set or Changed - {!Opportunity.Installation_Start_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Installation Scheduled Date has been set or changed to {!Opportunity.Installation_Start_Date__c} for {!Opportunity.Contact__c} at {!Account.BillingAddress}.
Regards, Palmetto (855) 339-1831
